resources.string:
Have you ever wished you could go to the store with the "thank you" that you got from other people?

well, now you can!

this app enables you to give and get thanks that has value except on it\'s own!

You will get the opportunity to thank someone each day

there are a few rules though:

1. you can\'t use the "thank you"s that you are being given by the app, you can only give it away

2. you can use the "thank you" that you are being given by another person

3. you can give thank you to a certain person once a month

4. this person cant\'t give you back at the same month

5. if you give to the same person month after month in a row, this person will not be able to be given by you at the next 6 months

6. the more you give thank you\'s to less related people to you, the next thank you that you will get from someone will have more value

7. you can "register" all the people that you want to give thanks for and in the end of the day decide who you want to give it to
